thread.title: Faltering Progress in Africa a Worrying Sign for Governments and Investors
thread.title_full: Faltering Progress in Africa a Worrying Sign for Governments and Investors - WSJ

author: Patrick McGroarty
title: Faltering Progress in Africa a Worrying Sign for Governments and Investors
text:
Faltering economic and political progress in Africa is a worrying sign to governments and foreign investors counting on the continent to serve as the next engine of global economic growth, one of Africa’s most prominent businessmen said Monday.
“Things are stalling,” said Mo Ibrahim, who earned billions of dollars installing some of Africa’s first mobile phone networks. “We can’t pat ourselves on the back and pretend everything is...
